checks.name: NO_MFA_ON_ROOT
checks.template: No MFA found on root account. Please set an MFA on the root account. https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/enable-mfa-for-root.html

checks.name: NO_PASSWORD_POLICY
checks.template: The account doens't have password policy. Please set a password policy. https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_passwords_account-policy.html

checks.name: PUBLIC_BUCKETS
checks.template: The following S3 buckets has some public access settings. Please review and remove public access as necessary. Buckets: $buckets

checks.name: MISSING_TAGS
checks.template: One or more resources are missing tags. Please add tags to AWS resources. https://docs.aws.amazon.com/tag-editor/latest/userguide/tagging.html. TODO: add formated version of resources

checks.name: NO_BUSINESS_SUPPORT
checks.template: Business support is not enabled on this account. Please consider upgarding to business support. https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/
